moves.1. e4 Nc6 2. d4 d5 3. e5 Bf5 4. Nf3 Qd7:
Easy chess puzzle:
White moves and checkmates in 4.
Good luck, and dont cheat! hehehe
moves.31... Ke7 32. Qc7+:
32. Qc7 ! Black Resigns,
but after:
32...           Ke8
33.Qd7     Kf8
And 34. Qd8# Checkmate.

32...        Kf6
33. Qf7# Checkmate.

And if:
32...     Kf8
33. Qd8# Checkmate.

Nice isnt it?
Hehehe 
Im open for any challenge :)
Cya
